review_data.title: The bar keeper is so rude
review_data.content: My husband and I went to this bar with our friends after a movie. We ordered the drinks. I was a little bit tired, so I put my head on the table, got some rest. Then the bar keeper came to me and yelled at...More

review_data.title: In Zurich? Pay a visit for sure.....
review_data.content: Stopped by on Saturday - lively but not too much bar with awesome bar staff and good mix of clientele. Cocktails are awesome - especially the Cosmo - great beer - and generous pours in a super expensive city. Just chilled here with wife and...More

review_data.title: Buen bar para tomar algo
review_data.content: Buen ambiente, buenas copas y buena música... Para tomar algo tranquilamente con buena música esta muy bien.

review_data.title: Cool bar in Old town
review_data.content: Great drinks and outdoor seating to people watch and soak in old town vibes. My server was super friendly.

review_data.title: Cool bar
review_data.content: Came across this bar by chance last night. Cool music playing, great atmosphere and brilliant bar man. Givan made great cocktails - yum espresso martinis! We will be back:)

review_data.title: Great Little Bar
review_data.content: This is a great little bar. We happened across it after dinner. The bar tender, Givan, was high energy and entertaining. Prices were very reasonable and service was fast. Everyone was very friendly. We went home having made several new friends.

review_data.title: Noch kurz einen Caipi geniessen
review_data.content: Wollten nach einem Kinobesuch noch einen Caipi geniessen!? Zuerst bekamen wir keine Aufmerksamkeit von dem Barmitarbeiter und mussten eindringlich drum...More

review_data.title: A great bar
review_data.content: Called in here after an average and expensive dinner. It was also starting to snow so getting into somewhere warm was nice. The place was very full but I managed to get a seat at the bar. I had a couple of very nice gluhweins....More

review_data.title: Pausa veloce ed informale
review_data.content: Ci siamo fermati in questo locale per bere una cosa dopocena. Il locale è piccolissimo ma molto carino. L’arredento è...More

review_data.title: Toll
review_data.content: Tolle Bar, tolle Atmosphäre. Im Herzen Zürichs und freundlicher Service. Gute Musik. Sehr empfehlenswert!

review_data.title: Great relaxed atmosphere, great service
review_data.content: Sat alone on the bar for a drink or two. Music was great, variety of drinks is good, nice people around. Do you need more? (-:

review_data.title: Super coole bar
review_data.content: Coole bar mit super guten drinks, guter stimmung und toller service!! Hatten einen lässigen abend :) und komme gerne wieder

review_data.title: nice small bar for a drink.
review_data.content: It's good to have a non-poshy place in the old town. It's a nice, small bar where you feel comfortable. Good for a beer or cocktil. The service is friendly.

review_data.title: Sympa
review_data.content: Nous cherchions un endroit où boire un verre et discuter pour des retrouvailles. L'ambiance était sympa et accueillante. Belle soirée,...More

review_data.title: A classis choice of bar
review_data.content: We used to come here with friends like 10 years ago but I haven't been in ages. They are famous for their magheritas, so famous you often forget how good they are.

review_data.title: Piccolo ma carino
review_data.content: Bel locale, non grande ma con la possibilità di avere tavoli all'esterno. Bella atmosfera, buona scelta di cocktails, personale gentile....More

review_data.title: Nice bar with lively guests at the sidewalk tables
review_data.content: This Old Town bar is located inside the small Hotel Otter. On warm evenings, the late crowds sitting at the sidewalk tables can be very lively and jovial. During the early evening, it’s a nice spot for a beverage and winding down the day. The...More

review_data.title: Good start of a night out!
review_data.content: The Wüste Bar is s small bar inside the hotel Otter. The bar has a great ambiance and good cocktails. It is pretty small but one of my favorite bars in Oberdorf to start the night out. Staff is friendly and I always like to...More
